column2: "Curse you, CURSE YOU ALL! What's wrong with pursuing power and wealth...! I did it all for this nation!"

"Its now come to this...
I will summon a Devil Castle, right
here! I will personally ensure that
the traitors have been dealt with a powerful might!"
"With justice on my side, the sins of those who filled the ears of people with falsehoods and lead this nation into chaos..."
"No longer shall there be room for you!"
"Even if they were a real savior... As long as we have Ephimera, such things are meaningless!"
"As long as we have this, legends carry no weight here! Let the whole world watch as legends are rewritten!"
